list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The child was riding a brown pony.

list_ex_of_english: There are approximately 140,000 acres of moor on which there are about 5,000 cattle, 2,000 ponies and 40,000 sheep.
The heterogeneities present in a data set of experimentally infected ponies are examined, and a model of equine influenza that incorporates some of this heterogeneity is derived.
There is serious overbreeding because many horses, donkeys and ponies are not needed and therefore neglected.

There is not a colliery owner in this country who keeps his ponies at a mere subsistence level.

They are not fairly described as scrub ponies.
